channel.title: Item slots
channel.description:
I am not sure if this is the right section, sorry if it isn't. Is there anyone who has a program that changes the item slot a custom item is equipped in? When i wield the divine shield i added to my server it goes to the helmet slot and i need it fixed... thanks :)
**EDIT** it's PI source in case that makes a difference and there is no item4.java in it

item.title: Item slots
item.dc:creator: @samrofl samrofl
item.description:
@samrofl wrote:

rip4d:

You have to edit it yourself in item4.java

he just said there isnt an item4.java… EDIT: He added that soon after you posted, apologies,

on topic, go to “item” and where theres a list of “public int shields” (cant remember exactly what it is) add the spirit shield ID at the end of the list then it should work. hope that helps!

Read full topic
